title: Portal is dedicated to Theater Directors of Belarus
p1: Currently, there are 28 state theaters in the country: twelve in Minsk, three in Gomel, two each in Grodno, Mogilev, Vitebsk, Brest and Molodechno, one each in Bobruisk, Slonim and Mozyr. The best performances, directing and acting are recognized both at home and abroad.
p2: Theatrical life of Belarus is full of vibrant festival events. The prestigious theater festivals to which collectives from all over the world have received permanent residence in different cities of the country. In the framework of the International Festival of Arts "Slavianski Bazaar in Vitebsk" the program "Teatralnie vstrechi" is being held by the audience that is loved by the public.
p3: The Belarusian theater is famous for its outstanding directors. With the creativity and biography of some of them, we are pleased to introduce you to our portal.
